text: “Eghtɨ Sirian atrivir kam uan ifongiamɨn bizibar amuam. Egh a uabɨ uan ziam fɨva kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, kɨ aseba bar dagh afira. Egh an akar dɨbovibav kɨmɨva, Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itimɨn ziam dɨkabɨnam. A kamaghɨra damu mangɨvɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ Godɨn anɨngagharimɨn dughiam otogham. Guizbangɨra, God uan nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ, biziba bar dar amuam.
